channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 观点：如果说特朗普时代的美国政治让我们学到了什么，那就是民调机构几乎总是搞错，@SpiegelPeter 写道。这次也不例外
item.description:
Opinion: If there’s anything we’ve learned about US politics in the age of Trump it is that pollsters almost always get it wrong, writes @SpiegelPeter . This time was no different https://t.co/vGnGVJliRJ

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 有迹象表明，参加 "超级星期二 "民主党总统初选的选民正在对乔-拜登总统处理以哈战争的方式投抗议票，因为在一些州，未承诺投票的民主党选民比例相对较高：
item.description:
There were signs that voters in Super Tuesday’s Democratic presidential primaries were casting protest votes against President Joe Biden’s approach to the Israel-Hamas war, as the share of uncommitted Democratic voters was relatively high in some states: https://t.co/UvpL9eI6vm pic.twitter.com/rMRFd7Kmpc

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 秘密的非特朗普选民 "之谜
item.description:

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）今晚拿下了她的第一个州。佛蒙特州是海莉赢得的第二场初选胜利，她还赢得了华盛顿特区的初选，不过她未能阻挡特朗普向共和党提名发起冲击的势头。关注现场直播：
item.description:
Nikki Haley has picked up her first state of the night. Vermont was the second primary win for Haley, who also won Washington DC, though she has failed to dent Trump’s momentum as he barrels toward the Republican nomination. Follow live: https://t.co/qzJkEKQUq6 pic.twitter.com/dmR8pMr7YK

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国官方国防预算今年将增长 7.2%，但专家认为这一数字掩盖了对军事能力的更大提升
item.description:
China's official defence budget will increase by 7.2% this year but experts believe the figure masks a much bigger boost for military capabilities https://t.co/dC2FXGmusp

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国军事能力的增长速度将超过国防预算的增长速度
item.description:

item.title: 观点：洛伊研究所的 Ryan Neelam 写道：中国外交网络的卓越规模反映了其全球野心的广度。
item.description:
Opinion: The pre-eminent size of China’s diplomatic network reflects the breadth of its global ambitions, writes Ryan Neelam of the Lowy Institute https://t.co/KbU53ATZUn

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 早上好，亚洲。当你们还在睡觉时，我们阅读量最高的报道探讨了挪威主权财富基金将私募股权投资纳入其任务范围的投资案例
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 到目前为止，唐纳德-特朗普在本轮选举中的表现比民调预测的还要糟糕。让我们看看今晚是否会有所改变：
item.description:
So far this election cycle, Donald Trump has done worse than the polls have predicted. Let's see if that changes tonight: https://t.co/rRVmeQ7P6p pic.twitter.com/BLdDfs3f6d

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: 受美国降息预期升温、投资者追捧避险资产以及央行和中国投资者数月来大举买入黄金的影响，黄金价格飙升至历史新高：
item.description:
The price of gold has surged to a record high, driven by growing expectations of US interest rate cuts, investors hunting for haven assets and months of prodigious buying by central banks and Chinese investors: https://t.co/fMZCoiVUvO pic.twitter.com/xvs28bKZHV

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国正在进行 "超级星期二 "选举。今晚的选举结果将使美国离 11 月乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普的总统复选更近一步，因为选民们都在投票
item.description:
Super Tuesday is underway in the US. Tonight’s results will put the country one step closer to a Joe Biden-Donald Trump presidential rematch in November as voters hit the polls https://t.co/fhG4D5DbqW pic.twitter.com/4SCO90AvyL

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024

item.title: FT 独家报道：普华永道发现三名高级合伙人违反了领导层选举规则，因此剥夺了他们的管理职位，并取消了其中一人竞选美国业务的资格
item.description:
FT Exclusive: PwC stripped three senior partners of their management roles and disqualified one of them from the race to run its US business after finding they breached leadership election rules https://t.co/NtA2lC3QMB pic.twitter.com/vAAI9QbPKo

— Financial Times (@FT) March 5, 2024
